definition: The term refers to the period of time when individuals are not engaged in work or other obligatory activities. It commonly encompasses leisure, recreational, and non-working hours, allowing individuals to pursue personal interests, hobbies, and relaxation.

examples.german: Ich habe am Wochenende viel Freizeit.
examples.english: I have a lot of free time on the weekend.

examples.german: In meiner Freizeit spiele ich gerne Fußball.
examples.english: I like to play soccer in my free time.

examples.german: Was machst du in deiner Freizeit?
examples.english: What do you do in your free time?

examples.german: Ich verbringe meine Freizeit gerne mit Freunden.
examples.english: I enjoy spending my free time with friends.

examples.german: In meiner Freizeit lese ich gerne Bücher.
examples.english: I like to read books in my free time.
